text: kapaṭaviśvāsikaḷuṁ viśvāsinikaḷuṁ satyaviśvāsikaḷēāṭ ivvidhaṁ paṟayunna dinamāṇat: niṅṅaḷ ñaṅṅaḷkkāyi kāttu nilkkaṇē, niṅṅaḷuṭe veḷiccattil ninn ittiri ñaṅṅaḷuṁ anubhavikkaṭṭe. appēāḷ avarēāṭ paṟayuṁ: "niṅṅaḷ niṅṅaḷuṭe piṟakilēkku tanne tiriccupēāvuka. enniṭṭ veḷiccaṁ tēṭuka.” appēāḷ avarkkiṭayil oru bhitti uyarttappeṭuṁ. atineāru kavāṭamuṇṭāyirikkuṁ. atinṟe akabhāgatt kāruṇyavuṁ puṟabhāgatt śikṣayumāyirikkuṁ
